Package org.eventchain

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Journal
    Journal is the storage of all events and commands registered through Eventchain.
    Journal.Listener
    Journalling listener.
    Lock
    Simple lock interface to be used for synchronization in Eventchain applications.
    LockProvider
    Provides a mechanism for locks (see Lock)
    Repository
    Repository is holder of resources necessary to facilitate Eventchain operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Command<R>
    Command is a request for changes in the domain.
    CommandConsumer<T extends Command<C>,C>  
    Entity  
    EntityHandle<T extends Entity>
    EntityHandle is a "lazy loading" handle for Entity
    Event
    Event is a statement of a fact that has occurred once written to a journal.
    MemoryJournal
    Memory-based Journal implementation.
    MemoryLockProvider
    Local, in-memory lock provider
    RepositoryImpl
